item.title: CVE-2022-3069|2024-08-03T01:00:10.349Z -- unknown -- wordlift%20%E2%80%93%20ai%20powered%20seo%20%E2%80%93%20schema
item.description: The WordLift WordPress plugin before 3.37.2 does not sanitise and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
